# Forecasting sampled tick abundance {.unlisted .unnumbered #ticks}

Visit the NEON Ecological Forecasting Initiative web site and develop a model to forecast sampled [tick abundance](https://projects.ecoforecast.org/neon4cast-docs/Ticks.html) by following the instructions for the challenge. Note that this challenge occurred in 2021.

Your model needs to include a complete written description of the model you develop.
